name: 3.5 "Sam Turns the Other Cheek" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why did Sam break up with the woman?
questions.explanation:
She was married.

	Sam told her he had a strict rule about married women. He would not knowingly date them which was why he had to break it off when he found out she was married.

questions.text: What were the three types of women Sam wouldn't date?
questions.explanation:
married, underage, and comatose.

	Diane said, "The pig has scruples." He added comatose to his list as that wasn't in the original list.

questions.text: Why was Carla in a bad mood?
questions.explanation:
She had a toothache.

	Carla was afraid to go to the dentist to get the tooth looked at. Consequently, everyone in the bar had to deal with her foul mood.

his mother.

	Cliff had an unhealthy attachment to his mother. His mother often ridiculed him causing them to fight a lot.

The woman's husband.

	The man was planning to shoot Sam because Sam was seeing his wife. However, Sam managed to get the gun from him.

questions.text: Where did Sam accidentally shoot himself?
questions.explanation:
in the butt.

	Sam was planning to put the gun in his back pocket. When he sat down, the gun went off, shooting him in the rear end.

questions.text: What did Sam say happened to explain his wound?
questions.correct: A thief came to the bar and shot him in the leg.
options: A crazy man came in and shot him in the leg.
A bar fight broke out and he got shot busting it up.
questions.explanation:
A thief came to the bar and shot him in the leg.

	Sam didn't want to tell the truth, that a jealous husband came after him. Even worse, he didn't want to admit he shot himself with the gun.

questions.text: What did Coach say was rotten in Denmark?
questions.explanation:
"All that cheese".

	Diane was quoting from "Hamlet" when she said "something is rotten in the state of Denmark." Coach did not get the reference so instead answered her with what could be rotten in Denmark.

questions.text: Who first found out the truth about how Sam was shot?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane confronted Sam in his office. She then told him he had to tell the rest of the bar the truth.

questions.text: Who kept Sam from getting shot again?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane told the man a story about how she was in love with Sam. The man wanted to shoot Sam but said he couldn't hurt Diane.
